skills.name: Monkey Wand
skills.description: Attacks with the Monkey Wand and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: All or Nothing
skills.description: Attacks all enemies and decreases their Attack Bar by 30%.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.name: Giant Net
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a giant net and puts them to sleep for 1 turn and decreases the Attack Speed for 2 turns with an 80% chance each. The damage of this skill will increase according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.multiplier_formula: 2.7*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
